article.para: The purpose of this document is to describe how the different pieces of Ulteo OVD are supported on Ubuntu 08.04 (Hardy Heron) system.

section.title: Prerequisites: Ubuntu 08.04 (Hardy Heron)
section.para: Ubuntu 08.04 (Hardy Heron) was the LTS version of Ubuntu untill 2010. There are several edition: desktop/server, 32/64 bits. This documentation has been done for the server edition (32/64 bits) but it should also work for desktop edition. Ubuntu system can be downloaded here.

warning.para: The new LTS version is Ubuntu 10.04 (Lucid Lynx). If you don't really need to use Ubuntu 08.04 version, it's higly recommanded to use the latest LTS version: Ubuntu 10.04 (Lucid Lynx) and read the Ubuntu 10.04 (Lucid Lynx) documentation.
